casebody.data:
Enrico VACCARO
v.
SHELL BEACH CONDOMINIUM, INC., et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided February 1, 2017

Emily A. Gianquinto, in support of the petition.

Daniel J. Krisch and Sharon Baldwin, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn. App. 21, 148 A.3d 1123 (2016), is denied.
